entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
